response.original_title: Princess Enchanted Tales - A Kingdom of Kindness
response.overview: Disney Princess Enchanted Tales: A Kingdom of Kindness is a unofficial 2005 direct-to-video animated feature produced by DisneyToon Studios. It was actually the first film in the brand new Disney Princess Enchanted Tales series (including Follow Your Dreams) of direct-to-video films, each featuring new stories about the Disney Princesses; Belle and Ariel--including her daughter; Melody, guest star from The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea, makes her appearance for the first time. It was released on July 4, 2005 by Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment.
response.title: Princess Enchanted Tales - A Kingdom of Kindness
